ClassInfo.author: JEAF Development Team
ClassInfo.description: Class contains all generated constants for messages of JEAF JSON

Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown in case that an exception occurs during JSON serialization of an object.
Message.name: JSON_SERIALIZATION_FAILED

Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown in case that an exception occurs during JSON deserialization of an object.
Message.name: JSON_DESERIALIZATION_FAILED

Message.defaultText: Only TextNodes are expected to be processed by this deserializer. Current JSON node ''{0}'' is of type ''{1}''.
Message.description: AbstractObjectIDDeserializer expects Object-IDs to be serialized as text only. If it was serialized as real object then exception with this error code will be thrown.
Message.name: UNEXPECTED_NODE_TYPE_FOR_OBJECT_ID_DESERIAL

Message.defaultText: Unable to deserialize object of type ''{0}''. Expected text node but received other type of JSON content. Current JSON node ''{1}'' is of type ''{2}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown in case that unexpected node type is part of the JSON data that should be deserialized.
Message.name: UNEXPECTED_NODE_TYPE_FOR_DESERIALIZATION

Message.defaultText: REST call returned problem JSON (http status code: {0})
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown in case that a REST call returned a problem JSON instead of a real response.
Message.name: RECEIVED_REST_PROBLEM_JSON

Message.defaultText: Unable to process REST response from resource ''{0}}''. {1}
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown in case that a REST response could not be processed on client side due to some problem.
Message.name: REST_RESPONSE_PROCESSING_ERROR

Message.defaultText: Unable to close http response object for REST resource ''{0}}''. {1}
Message.description: This error code is used in case that a http response object could not be closed properly.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CLOSE_HTTP_RESPONSE

Message.defaultText: Unable to call REST service ''{0}'' at URL ''[1}}''. Circuit breaker is open (state = {2}).
Message.description: This error code is used in case that a circuit breaker for external REST services is open.
Message.name: CIRCUIT_BREAKER_OPEN

Message.defaultText: Circuit breaker for REST service ''{0}'' at URL ''[1}}'' is not protecting the system. Circuit breaker is in state ''{2}''.
Message.description: This error code is used in case that a circuit breaker is not protecting the system due to ist state.
Message.name: CIRCUIT_BREAKER_NOT_ACTIVE
